name: Prismatic Gravity
description:
Prismatic Gravity is the adventure of Egg Newton as it navigates its way through a realm where gravity changes based on color.  This game was made for the 62nd Mini Jam with the theme of colors and the limitation of having no more than 2 frames per animation.

The Music is the song Skate by Komiku, and is licensed under public domain (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Soun...)

The font used is Century Gothic.

All other assets are made by me.

If you would be willing to send me egg puns for future updates of the game my twitter handle is @IvMulligan.  I would be forever grateful for the rest of the day at least.  Thanks for stopping by!
